001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.input;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.AbstractComponentService;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.ComponentType;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.factory.ComponentFactory;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.filters.FilterStrategy;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.log.LogUi;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
009import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
010import org.openqa.selenium.By;
011
012/**
013 * Provides service-level operations for interacting with input components.
014 *
015 * <p>This class manages interactions with input fields, such as inserting values,
016 * clearing fields, retrieving values, checking states, and handling table-based operations.
017 * The actual interactions are delegated to specific {@link Input} implementations based on
018 * the provided {@link InputComponentType}.
019 *
020 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
021 */
022public class InputServiceImpl extends AbstractComponentService<InputComponentType, Input> implements InputService {
023
024   /**
025    * Constructs a new InputServiceImpl using the specified SmartWebDriver.
026    *
027    * @param driver the SmartWebDriver used for UI interactions.
028    */
029   public InputServiceImpl(SmartWebDriver driver) {
030      super(driver);
031   }
032
033   /**
034    * Creates an Input instance for the given component type.
035    *
036    * @param componentType the input component type.
037    * @return a new or cached Input instance.
038    */
039   @Override
040   protected Input createComponent(final InputComponentType componentType) {
041      return ComponentFactory.getInputComponent(componentType, driver);
042   }
043
044   /**
045    * Inserts a value into the specified input container.
046    *
047    * @param componentType the input component type.
048    * @param container     the input field container.
049    * @param value         the value to insert.
050    */
051   @Override
052   public void insert(final InputComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container, final String value) {
053      LogUi.step("Inserting value: '{}' into input component of type: '{}'.", value, componentType.getType().name());
054      inputComponent(componentType).insert(container, value);
055   }
056
057   /**
058    * Inserts a value into an input field within a container identified by its label.
059    *
060    * @param componentType   the input component type.
061    * @param container       the input field container.
062    * @param inputFieldLabel the label of the input field.
063    * @param value           the value to insert.
064    */
065   @Override
066   public void insert(final InputComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
067                      final String inputFieldLabel, final String value) {
068      LogUi.step("Inserting value: '{}' into input field labeled: '{}' of type: '{}'.", value, inputFieldLabel,
069            componentType.getType().name());
070      inputComponent(componentType).insert(container, inputFieldLabel, value);
071   }
072
073   /**
074    * Inserts a value into an input field identified by its label.
075    *
076    * @param componentType   the input component type.
077    * @param inputFieldLabel the label of the input field.
078    * @param value           the value to insert.
079    */
080   @Override
081   public void insert(final InputComponentType componentType, final String inputFieldLabel, final String value) {
082      LogUi.step("Inserting value: '{}' into input field labeled: '{}' of type: '{}'.", value, inputFieldLabel,
083            componentType.getType().name());
084      inputComponent(componentType).insert(inputFieldLabel, value);
085   }
086
087   /**
088    * Inserts a value into an input field located by a specified locator.
089    *
090    * @param componentType              the input component type.
091    * @param inputFieldContainerLocator the locator for the input field container.
092    * @param value                      the value to insert.
093    */
094   @Override
095   public void insert(final InputComponentType componentType, final By inputFieldContainerLocator,
096                      final String value) {
097      LogUi.step("Inserting value: '{}' into input component of type: '{}'.", value, componentType.getType().name());
098      inputComponent(componentType).insert(inputFieldContainerLocator, value);
099   }
100
101   /**
102    * Clears the value of the specified input container.
103    *
104    * @param componentType the input component type.
105    * @param container     the input field container.
106    */
107   @Override
108   public void clear(final InputComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container) {
109      LogUi.step("Clearing value in input component of type: '{}'.", componentType.getType().name());
110      inputComponent(componentType).clear(container);
111   }
112
113   /**
114    * Clears the value of an input field within a container identified by its label.
115    *
116    * @param componentType   the input component type.
117    * @param container       the input field container.
118    * @param inputFieldLabel the label of the input field.
119    */
120   @Override
121   public void clear(final InputComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
122                     final String inputFieldLabel) {
123      LogUi.step("Clearing value in input field labeled: '{}' of type: '{}'.", inputFieldLabel,
124            componentType.getType().name());
125      inputComponent(componentType).clear(container, inputFieldLabel);
126   }
127
128   /**
129    * Clears the value from an input field identified by a label.
130    *
131    * @param componentType   the input component type.
132    * @param inputFieldLabel the label of the input field to be cleared.
133    */
134   @Override
135   public void clear(final InputComponentType componentType, final String inputFieldLabel) {
136      LogUi.step("Clearing value in input field labeled: '{}' of type: '{}'.", inputFieldLabel,
137            componentType.getType().name());
138      inputComponent(componentType).clear(inputFieldLabel);
139   }
140
141   /**
142    * Clears the value from an input field located by a specified locator.
143    *
144    * @param componentType              the input component type.
145    * @param inputFieldContainerLocator the locator for the input field container to be cleared.
146    */
147   @Override
148   public void clear(final InputComponentType componentType, final By inputFieldContainerLocator) {
149      LogUi.step("Clearing value in input component of type: '{}'.", componentType.getType().name());
150      inputComponent(componentType).clear(inputFieldContainerLocator);
151   }
152
153   /**
154    * Retrieves the value from the specified input container.
155    *
156    * @param componentType the input component type.
157    * @param container     the input field container.
158    * @return the value from the input field.
159    */
160   @Override
161   public String getValue(final InputComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container) {
162      LogUi.step("Fetching value from input component of type: '{}'.", componentType.getType().name());
163      return inputComponent(componentType).getValue(container);
164   }
165
166   /**
167    * Retrieves the value from an input field identified by a label within a specified container.
168    *
169    * @param componentType   the input component type.
170    * @param container       the container holding the input field.
171    * @param inputFieldLabel the label of the input field.
172    * @return the current value of the input field.
173    */
174   @Override
175   public String getValue(final InputComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
176                          final String inputFieldLabel) {
177      LogUi.step("Fetching value from input field labeled: '{}' of type: '{}'.", inputFieldLabel,
178            componentType.getType().name());
179      return inputComponent(componentType).getValue(container, inputFieldLabel);
180   }
181
182   /**
183    * Retrieves the value from an input field identified by a label.
184    *
185    * @param componentType   the input component type.
186    * @param inputFieldLabel the label of the input field.
187    * @return the current value of the input field.
188    */
189   @Override
190   public String getValue(final InputComponentType componentType, final String inputFieldLabel) {
191      LogUi.step("Fetching value from input field labeled: '{}' of type: '{}'.", inputFieldLabel,
192            componentType.getType().name());
193      return inputComponent(componentType).getValue(inputFieldLabel);
194   }
195
196   /**
197    * Retrieves the value from an input field located by a specified locator.
198    *
199    * @param componentType              the input component type.
200    * @param inputFieldContainerLocator the locator for the input field container.
201    * @return the current value of the input field.
202    */
203   @Override
204   public String getValue(final InputComponentType componentType, final By inputFieldContainerLocator) {
205      LogUi.step("Fetching value from input component of type: '{}'.", componentType.getType().name());
206      return inputComponent(componentType).getValue(inputFieldContainerLocator);
207   }
208
209   /**
210    * Checks if the specified input field is enabled.
211    *
212    * @param componentType the input component type.
213    * @param container     the input field container.
214    * @return true if the field is enabled, false otherwise.
215    */
216   @Override
217   public boolean isEnabled(final InputComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container) {
218      LogUi.step("Checking if input component of type: '{}' is enabled.", componentType.getType().name());
219      return inputComponent(componentType).isEnabled(container);
220   }
221
222   /**
223    * Checks if an input field identified by a label within a specified container is enabled.
224    *
225    * @param componentType   the input component type.
226    * @param container       the container holding the input field.
227    * @param inputFieldLabel the label of the input field.
228    * @return {@code true} if the input field is enabled; {@code false} otherwise.
229    */
230   @Override
231   public boolean isEnabled(final InputComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
232                            final String inputFieldLabel) {
233      LogUi.step("Checking if input field labeled: '{}' of type: '{}' is enabled.", inputFieldLabel,
234            componentType.getType().name());
235      return inputComponent(componentType).isEnabled(container, inputFieldLabel);
236   }
237
238   /**
239    * Checks if an input field identified by a label is enabled.
240    *
241    * @param componentType   the input component type.
242    * @param inputFieldLabel the label of the input field.
243    * @return {@code true} if the input field is enabled; {@code false} otherwise.
244    */
245   @Override
246   public boolean isEnabled(final InputComponentType componentType, final String inputFieldLabel) {
247      LogUi.step("Checking if input field labeled: '{}' of type: '{}' is enabled.", inputFieldLabel,
248            componentType.getType().name());
249      return inputComponent(componentType).isEnabled(inputFieldLabel);
250   }
251
252   /**
253    * Checks if an input field located by a specified locator is enabled.
254    *
255    * @param componentType              the input component type.
256    * @param inputFieldContainerLocator the locator for the input field container.
257    * @return {@code true} if the input field is enabled; {@code false} otherwise.
258    */
259   @Override
260   public boolean isEnabled(final InputComponentType componentType, final By inputFieldContainerLocator) {
261      LogUi.step("Checking if input component of type: '{}' is enabled.", componentType.getType().name());
262      return inputComponent(componentType).isEnabled(inputFieldContainerLocator);
263   }
264
265   /**
266    * Retrieves the error message from the specified input container.
267    *
268    * @param componentType the input component type.
269    * @param container     the input field container.
270    * @return the error message from the input field.
271    */
272   @Override
273   public String getErrorMessage(final InputComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container) {
274      LogUi.step("Fetching error message from input component of type: '{}'.", componentType.getType().name());
275      return inputComponent(componentType).getErrorMessage(container);
276   }
277
278   /**
279    * Retrieves the error message from an input field identified by a label within a specified container.
280    *
281    * @param componentType   the input component type.
282    * @param container       the container holding the input field.
283    * @param inputFieldLabel the label of the input field.
284    * @return the error message associated with the input field, or an empty string if none exists.
285    */
286   @Override
287   public String getErrorMessage(final InputComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
288                                 final String inputFieldLabel) {
289      LogUi.step("Fetching error message from input field labeled: '{}' of type: '{}'.", inputFieldLabel,
290            componentType.getType().name());
291      return inputComponent(componentType).getErrorMessage(container, inputFieldLabel);
292   }
293
294   /**
295    * Retrieves the error message from an input field identified by a label.
296    *
297    * @param componentType   the input component type.
298    * @param inputFieldLabel the label of the input field.
299    * @return the error message associated with the input field, or an empty string if none exists.
300    */
301   @Override
302   public String getErrorMessage(final InputComponentType componentType, final String inputFieldLabel) {
303      LogUi.step("Fetching error message from input field labeled: '{}' of type: '{}'.", inputFieldLabel,
304            componentType.getType().name());
305      return inputComponent(componentType).getErrorMessage(inputFieldLabel);
306   }
307
308   /**
309    * Retrieves the error message from an input field located by a specified locator.
310    *
311    * @param componentType              the input component type.
312    * @param inputFieldContainerLocator the locator for the input field container.
313    * @return the error message associated with the input field, or an empty string if none exists.
314    */
315   @Override
316   public String getErrorMessage(final InputComponentType componentType, final By inputFieldContainerLocator) {
317      LogUi.step("Fetching error message from input component of type: '{}'.", componentType.getType().name());
318      return inputComponent(componentType).getErrorMessage(inputFieldContainerLocator);
319   }
320
321   /**
322    * Performs a table insertion action on a cell element using the input component.
323    *
324    * @param cellElement   the cell element where the input field is located.
325    * @param componentType the input component type.
326    * @param values        optional values for the insertion action.
327    */
328   @Override
329   public void tableInsertion(final SmartWebElement cellElement, final ComponentType componentType,
330                              final String... values) {
331      if (!(componentType instanceof InputComponentType)) {
332         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Component type needs to be from: InputComponentType.");
333      }
334      LogUi.step("Inserting values into table cell for component type: '{}'.", componentType.getType().name());
335      inputComponent((InputComponentType) componentType).tableInsertion(cellElement, values);
336   }
337
338   /**
339    * Performs a table filter operation using the input component.
340    *
341    * @param cellElement    the cell element where filtering is applied.
342    * @param componentType  the input component type.
343    * @param filterStrategy the filter strategy to apply.
344    * @param values         optional values for the filtering action.
345    */
346   @Override
347   public void tableFilter(final SmartWebElement cellElement, final ComponentType componentType,
348                           final FilterStrategy filterStrategy,
349                           final String... values) {
350      if (!(componentType instanceof InputComponentType)) {
351         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Component type needs to be from: InputComponentType.");
352      }
353      LogUi.step("Applying table filter for component type: '{}' with strategy: '{}'.",
354            componentType.getType().name(), filterStrategy);
355      inputComponent((InputComponentType) componentType).tableFilter(cellElement, filterStrategy, values);
356   }
357
358   /**
359    * Performs an insertion operation using the input component.
360    *
361    * @param componentType the input component type.
362    * @param locator       the locator of the input field.
363    * @param values        optional values to insert.
364    */
365   @Override
366   public void insertion(final ComponentType componentType, final By locator, final Object... values) {
367      if (!(componentType instanceof InputComponentType)) {
368         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Component type needs to be from: InputComponentType.");
369      }
370      LogUi.step("Inserting value into component of type: '{}' using locator.", componentType.getType().name());
371      insert((InputComponentType) componentType, locator, (String) values[0]);
372   }
373
374   /**
375    * Retrieves the Input instance for the given component type.
376    *
377    * @param componentType the input component type.
378    * @return the Input instance.
379    */
380   private Input inputComponent(final InputComponentType componentType) {
381      return getOrCreateComponent(componentType);
382   }
383}
